MESSAGE.JP: 声@「きょーすけが帰ってきたぞーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Kyousuke's back!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Kyousuke's back!❞

MESSAGE.JP: くから声。
MESSAGE.EN: A distant voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: A distant voice.

MESSAGE.JP: れに呼び覚まされたようだけど…すぐさま違和感に気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: It drew me out of sleep... even as I became aware of a bizarre feeling within me.
MESSAGE.Translation: It drew me out of sleep... even as I became aware of a bizarre feeling within me.

MESSAGE.JP: 見ていた夢だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The dream I had been seeing.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dream I had been seeing.

MESSAGE.JP: れを思い出そうと必死になる。
MESSAGE.EN: I desperately tried to hold onto its details.
MESSAGE.Translation: I desperately tried to hold onto its details.

MESSAGE.JP: ちろん、悪夢は悪夢だったんだけど…
MESSAGE.EN: Needless to say, it had been another nightmare...
MESSAGE.Translation: Needless to say, it had been another nightmare...

MESSAGE.JP: 日まで繰り返し見てきた同じ『悪夢』ではない。
MESSAGE.EN: However, it was different from those usual ❛nightmares❜ I kept on seeing over and over.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, it was different from those usual ❛nightmares❜ I kept on seeing over and over.

MESSAGE.JP: が見てきた夢よりももっと陰惨で…
MESSAGE.EN: Much more gruesome than any of the others I'd ever seen...
MESSAGE.Translation: Much more gruesome than any of the others I'd ever seen...

MESSAGE.JP: いがない。
MESSAGE.EN: beyond all salvation.
MESSAGE.Translation: beyond all salvation.

MESSAGE.JP: さに絶望だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It truly had been despair made manifest.
MESSAGE.Translation: It truly had been despair made manifest.

MESSAGE.JP: あんな光景を僕は知らない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I had never seen such a hideous scene in my entire life.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had never seen such a hideous scene in my entire life.

MESSAGE.JP: 体僕のどこから引っ張り出してきて、ねつ造された夢なんだか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Geez, what parts of my memories had mashed up to create that horrible vision...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Geez, what parts of my memories had mashed up to create that horrible vision...?

MESSAGE.JP: いや、ひとつだけ思い当たった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Wait, I think I've got it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Wait, I think I've got it.

MESSAGE.JP: 設校に通っていた、とあるグループが、この春休みに旅行先で事故に遭った。
MESSAGE.EN: The other day, I read a news article about a group of students who had gotten involved in an accident during their school trip.
MESSAGE.Translation: The other day, I read a news article about a group of students who had gotten involved in an accident during their school trip.

MESSAGE.JP: 聞記事でしか知らない話にも関わらず、どうしてあんなリアルに…。
MESSAGE.EN: How on earth could I draw such a detailed picture of the accident that I knew nothing about except for what I had read in the article?
MESSAGE.Translation: How on earth could I draw such a detailed picture of the accident that I knew nothing about except for what I had read in the article?

MESSAGE.JP: るでその場にいたような…。
MESSAGE.EN: The dream had felt as real as if I was actually experiencing the accident myself...
MESSAGE.Translation: The dream had felt as real as if I was actually experiencing the accident myself...

MESSAGE.JP: れも悪夢のひとつに加えられるとしたら、ぞっとする…。
MESSAGE.EN: It had been something so terrifying that I would count myself blessed to never see its like again...
MESSAGE.Translation: It had been something so terrifying that I would count myself blessed to never see its like again...

MESSAGE.JP: 度と見ませんように。そう祈った直後…。
MESSAGE.EN: I immediately gave a silent prayer that it would be the first and last time I saw it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I immediately gave a silent prayer that it would be the first and last time I saw it...

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「ついにこの時がきたか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Finally, the time has come...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Finally, the time has come...❞

MESSAGE.JP: びに打ち震える声。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard somebody's voice quivering in joy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard somebody's voice quivering in joy.

MESSAGE.JP: んと鼻息が聞こえて、それは床に飛び降りていた。
MESSAGE.EN: With rushed breath, the owner of the voice jumped down to the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: With rushed breath, the owner of the voice jumped down to the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人…こんな時間にどこにいくのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato... where are you going at this hour...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato... where are you going at this hour...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: る恐る訊いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked timidly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked timidly.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…戦いさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...To the fight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...To the fight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…は？　こんな夜に？　どこで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Huh? This late at night? Where?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Huh? This late at night? Where?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ここ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Right here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Right here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 指で床を指す。
MESSAGE.EN: With his thumb down, he pointed to the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: With his thumb down, he pointed to the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 敵な笑みを残し、勢いよくドアを開け放つと部屋を飛び出していった。
MESSAGE.EN: Leaving with a daring smile, Masato swung the door open and flew out of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Leaving with a daring smile, Masato swung the door open and flew out of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここって…まさか寮内ってこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right here... does he mean the dorm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right here... does he mean the dorm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwaa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwaa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の事実に気づくと飛び起き、真人の後を追って廊下へ。
MESSAGE.EN: I jumped to my feet upon realizing that, and chased after Masato into the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I jumped to my feet upon realizing that, and chased after Masato into the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: くで机をひっくり返したような物音がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear the sound of tables being overturned in the distance.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear the sound of tables being overturned in the distance.

MESSAGE.JP: 堂の前には、野次馬たちが押し寄せていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a crowd at the entrance of the cafeteria jostling their way inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a crowd at the entrance of the cafeteria jostling their way inside.

MESSAGE.JP: を覗くと、案の定、大立ち回りをするふたりの姿。
MESSAGE.EN: I peeked in, and sure enough, there was a fight.
MESSAGE.Translation: I peeked in, and sure enough, there was a fight.

MESSAGE.JP: 方は先ほど部屋を出ていったルームメイトである井ノ原真人。
MESSAGE.EN: On one side was Masato Inohara, my roommate.
MESSAGE.Translation: On one side was Masato Inohara, my roommate.

MESSAGE.JP: う片方は、袴姿の男、宮沢謙吾。
MESSAGE.EN: Across from him, wearing a hakama, was Kengo Miyazawa.
MESSAGE.Translation: Across from him, wearing a hakama, was Kengo Miyazawa.

MESSAGE.JP: たりとも僕の幼なじみだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Both of them were my childhood friends.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both of them were my childhood friends.

MESSAGE.JP: から犬猿の仲で、意見を違わせては喧嘩を繰り返してきている。
MESSAGE.EN: They had always been like oil and water, fighting whenever their opinions differed.
MESSAGE.Translation: They had always been like oil and water, fighting whenever their opinions differed.

MESSAGE.JP: 人が打って出る。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato started attacking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato started attacking.

MESSAGE.JP: を真横に捻り、大振りな拳を繰り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Twisting his body for momentum, he threw a heavy punch.
MESSAGE.Translation: Twisting his body for momentum, he threw a heavy punch.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾がぎりぎりのところでかわす。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo dodged narrowly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo dodged narrowly.

MESSAGE.JP: きぃぃっ！と後ろの机が拳でひび割れる。
MESSAGE.EN: *Bang*! And behind him lay a cracked desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bang*! And behind him lay a cracked desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒１@「さすがだな、井ノ原…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student 1@❝As expected of Inohara...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student 1@❝As expected of Inohara...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒２@「部活にも入らず無駄に鍛え上げられた筋肉をここぞとばかりに見せつけてやがる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student 2@❝Building his muscles without reason, despite not having joined any clubs, and using this opportunity to show them off...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student 2@❝Building his muscles without reason, despite not having joined any clubs, and using this opportunity to show them off...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当な解説が聞こえてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: A commentary had already begun.
MESSAGE.Translation: A commentary had already begun.

MESSAGE.JP: 度は謙吾の反撃。
MESSAGE.EN: Now was Kengo's turn to counterattack.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now was Kengo's turn to counterattack.

MESSAGE.JP: には、竹刀が握られている。
MESSAGE.EN: In his hands, he gripped his shinai.
MESSAGE.Translation: In his hands, he gripped his shinai.

MESSAGE.JP: の手が、一瞬ぶれて見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: His hand movement was only visible for an instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: His hand movement was only visible for an instant.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うおぉ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Whoa!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Whoa!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人が脇腹を突かれ、よろめく。
MESSAGE.EN: Receiving a thrust to his side, Masato lost his balance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Receiving a thrust to his side, Masato lost his balance.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子Ａ@「いきなり劣勢だぞ、どうした、真人ーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy A@❝C'mon, Masato, that can't be all you've got!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy A@❝C'mon, Masato, that can't be all you've got!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うっせぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Shut the hell up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Shut the hell up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだ隙をついて、次々と謙吾の竹刀が真人に降りかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: Catching Masato off-guard, Kengo kept attacking him with his shinai.
MESSAGE.Translation: Catching Masato off-guard, Kengo kept attacking him with his shinai.

MESSAGE.JP: った打ちだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a heavy rain of blows...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a heavy rain of blows...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「誰か止めてやってよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can't anyone stop this!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can't anyone stop this!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はそんな野次馬たちに訴える。
MESSAGE.EN: I appealed to the onlookers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I appealed to the onlookers.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒３@「えー、これからが面白いとこじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student 3@❝Eh, but it's getting interesting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student 3@❝Eh, but it's getting interesting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のふたりの喧嘩は校内ではすでに見せ物と化している。
MESSAGE.EN: Their fights on the campus had already turned into an attraction.
MESSAGE.Translation: Their fights on the campus had already turned into an attraction.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、謙吾が、本気だ…真人が怪我するよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But Kengo looks serious... Masato's gonna get hurt!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But Kengo looks serious... Masato's gonna get hurt!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒１@「じゃ、おまえが止めればいいだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student 1@❝Stop them yourself, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student 1@❝Stop them yourself, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ったく、その通りだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He's totally right.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's totally right.

MESSAGE.JP: うしてひとり慌てていたのだろう。それは僕の悪い癖かもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Why was I getting wound up by myself? I guess that's one of my bad habits.
MESSAGE.Translation: Why was I getting wound up by myself? I guess that's one of my bad habits.

MESSAGE.JP: り合いふたりが喧嘩を始めてる。
MESSAGE.EN: Two people I know were fighting.
MESSAGE.Translation: Two people I know were fighting.

MESSAGE.JP: 強なふたりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They were tough ones both.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were tough ones both.

MESSAGE.JP: も、ふたりは僕の親友だ。
MESSAGE.EN: However, they were my friends.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, they were my friends.

MESSAGE.JP: でねじ伏せようとしなくても、なんとかなるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I should be able to stop them without using force.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I should be able to stop them without using force.

MESSAGE.JP: は駆けていって、真人を庇うようにその合間に割ってはいった。
MESSAGE.EN: I ran in and placed myself between the two of them, shielding Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ran in and placed myself between the two of them, shielding Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そこまでっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's enough...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's enough...❞

MESSAGE.JP: きぃっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bang*!

MESSAGE.JP: 中に激痛が。
MESSAGE.EN: An intense pain shot up my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: An intense pain shot up my back.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そこまで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's enough...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's enough...❞

MESSAGE.JP: う繰り返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I repeated.
MESSAGE.Translation: I repeated.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「勝負はついてるよ…謙吾…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The fight is over... Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The fight is over... Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んなこたねぇよ…とめんなよ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No, it's not... Don't interrupt us, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No, it's not... Don't interrupt us, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「反撃の機を窺ってただけだ、邪魔すんじゃねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I was just biding my time. Get outta my way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I was just biding my time. Get outta my way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人が僕を押しのけ、再び謙吾と対峙する。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato pushed me aside and faced Kengo yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato pushed me aside and faced Kengo yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: 采があがる。
MESSAGE.EN: A cheering ovation erupted for them.
MESSAGE.Translation: A cheering ovation erupted for them.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「竹刀を持った謙吾に敵うはずないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can't beat Kengo when he's using his shinai!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can't beat Kengo when he's using his shinai!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んなこたねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yes, I can...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yes, I can...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだ、ルールを作ろうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh yeah, why don't we make some rules?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh yeah, why don't we make some rules?❞

MESSAGE.JP: を閉ざせばすぐにも再開されそうな緊迫感の中、僕は思いつくままに喋り続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I just said whatever rolled off my tongue since they felt certain to charge each other again at any moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just said whatever rolled off my tongue since they felt certain to charge each other again at any moment.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「素手だと、真人が強すぎる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In bare-handed fighting, Masato's too strong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In bare-handed fighting, Masato's too strong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「竹刀を持たせると、逆に謙吾が強すぎる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Conversely, Kengo becomes too strong when he uses his shinai.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Conversely, Kengo becomes too strong when he uses his shinai.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 次馬のほうに顔を向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned to face the onlookers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned to face the onlookers.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みんながなんでもいい、武器になりそうなものを適当に投げ入れてほしいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You over there, throw in whatever you think would work as a weapon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You over there, throw in whatever you think would work as a weapon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはくだらないものほどいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The more worthless, the better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The more worthless, the better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: び、真人と謙吾に向き直る。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned back toward Masato and Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned back toward Masato and Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その中からつかみ取ったもの、それを武器に戦う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whatever you can grab will be your weapon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whatever you can grab will be your weapon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「と、しよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And those are the rules.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And those are the rules.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…なんで、てめぇがルールなんて作るんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...What gives you the right to set some retarded rules?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...What gives you the right to set some retarded rules?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「同意だな。これは俺と真人、ふたりの戦いだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I won't accept them either. This is a fight between Masato and I.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I won't accept them either. This is a fight between Masato and I.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のことなんてまるで眼中にない、といったふうに、向かい合ったまま冷たく告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: They both answered coldly, their eyes focused on one another, paying little heed to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: They both answered coldly, their eyes focused on one another, paying little heed to me.

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり…僕では止められないのだろうか、このふたりは。
MESSAGE.EN: As I thought... I just can't stop these two?
MESSAGE.Translation: As I thought... I just can't stop these two?

MESSAGE.JP: としたら、いつものようにすがるしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I can only resort to the usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I can only resort to the usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!❞

MESSAGE.JP: はその姿を探した。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked around for him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked around for him.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…恭介は!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Where's Kyousuke!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Where's Kyousuke!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「え、あー、さっきまであそこに寝てたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝Eh, oh, I saw him sleeping over there until a few minutes ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝Eh, oh, I saw him sleeping over there until a few minutes ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さす先は野次馬の生徒でひしめき合っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Although I looked at where he pointed, all I saw was a tight crowd of students.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although I looked at where he pointed, all I saw was a tight crowd of students.

MESSAGE.JP: んなところに寝ていられるはずがない。
MESSAGE.EN: No one could possibly sleep in such a place.
MESSAGE.Translation: No one could possibly sleep in such a place.

MESSAGE.JP: でに起きあがっているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He must have already gotten up and moved somewhere else.
MESSAGE.Translation: He must have already gotten up and moved somewhere else.

MESSAGE.JP: 次馬たちを掻き分け、その名を叫びながら、僕は探し続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept looking for him, yelling his name, pushing through the onlookers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept looking for him, yelling his name, pushing through the onlookers.

MESSAGE.JP: がて人の波が引いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Soon enough, people started to leave the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: Soon enough, people started to leave the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 負がついたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like the fight was over.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like the fight was over.

MESSAGE.JP: されたのは、打ちのめされた真人ひとり。
MESSAGE.EN: Eventually there was only the beaten-up Masato left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Eventually there was only the beaten-up Masato left.

MESSAGE.JP: はその姿を前に呆然と立ちつくす。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood in front of him with a blank expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood in front of him with a blank expression.

MESSAGE.JP: 局、恭介は見つけられなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: To the end, I couldn't find Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: To the end, I couldn't find Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…なんだ同情か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...What's that, pitying me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...What's that, pitying me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「心配すんな…謙吾の奴も手負いだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Worry not... Kengo's injured too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Worry not... Kengo's injured too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっちのほうが心配するよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That makes me even more worried!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That makes me even more worried!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんでこんなことになっちゃったんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why did this whole mess have to happen...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why did this whole mess have to happen...❞

MESSAGE.JP: はひとりで歩けない真人に肩を貸してあげ、廊下を歩いて部屋に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: Lending my shoulder to Masato, who couldn't walk by himself, we slowly made our way back to our room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lending my shoulder to Masato, who couldn't walk by himself, we slowly made our way back to our room.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いつつ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ouchie...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ouchie...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の真人の、汗でべっとり張りついてくる肌から直接体温を感じながら…僕は考えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Feeling the heat radiating from his sweaty skin... I was thinking about something.
MESSAGE.Translation: Feeling the heat radiating from his sweaty skin... I was thinking about something.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ねぇ、真人…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Masato...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Masato...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いつから、僕たちは、こんなふうになっちゃったんだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just when did we turn out like this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just when did we turn out like this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: つてリトルバスターズというものがあった。
MESSAGE.EN: There used to be a team called the Little Busters.
MESSAGE.Translation: There used to be a team called the Little Busters.

MESSAGE.JP: たちは、その一員だった。
MESSAGE.EN: And we were all members of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: And we were all members of it.

MESSAGE.JP: の、一番辛かった日々。
MESSAGE.EN: Those were the roughest days of my life.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those were the roughest days of my life.

MESSAGE.JP: 親をなくしたすぐの日々。
MESSAGE.EN: My life after I lost my parents.
MESSAGE.Translation: My life after I lost my parents.

MESSAGE.JP: 日ふさぎ込んでいた日々。
MESSAGE.EN: Every day of my life was depressing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every day of my life was depressing.

MESSAGE.JP: んな僕の前に、４人の男の子が現れて、僕に手を差しのばしてくれたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But in front of me, four boys appeared, and one held out his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: But in front of me, four boys appeared, and one held out his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 男の子@「強敵があらわれたんだ！　きみの力がひつようなんだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝There's a formidable enemy! We need your power!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝There's a formidable enemy! We need your power!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男の子@「きみの名前は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝What's your name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝What's your name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…なおえ、りき」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Riki Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Riki Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男の子@「よし、いくぞ、りき！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝Okay, let's go, Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝Okay, let's go, Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 方的に手を掴んで、僕を引きずるように走り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: He grabbed my hand and pulled me along as he started running.
MESSAGE.Translation: He grabbed my hand and pulled me along as he started running.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ね、きみたちは!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, who are you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, who are you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: けないように必死についていきながら、そう訊く。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked him, desperately clinging onto his hand to prevent myself from falling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked him, desperately clinging onto his hand to prevent myself from falling.

MESSAGE.JP: 男の子@「おれたちか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝Who we are?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝Who we are?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男の子@「悪をせいばいする正義の味方」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝We punish evil and preserve justice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝We punish evil and preserve justice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男の子@「ひとよんで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝We are called...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝We are called...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男の子@「リトルバスターズさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝Little Busters!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝Little Busters!❞

MESSAGE.JP: をにやりと見せ、そう名乗った。
MESSAGE.EN: A broad grin split his face as he said the name.
MESSAGE.Translation: A broad grin split his face as he said the name.
